name: Cherry Blossom
description:
3-free nail polish, hand mixed in Brisbane, Australia!

This glitter topper polish is inspired by its namesake - the cherry blossom: a beautiful pink flower on a leafless branch.

This unique glitter mix consists of holographic gold hex glitter, larger pink holographic hex glitter, hot pink matte hex glitter, and micro specs of gold glitter dust. 

At Petal Polish we use high quality, '3-free' (Toulene, Formaldehyde, and DBP free) lacquer base to create our polishes.

name: Alyssum
description:
3-free nail polish, hand mixed in Brisbane, Australia!

This polish is inspired by the alyssum flower, particularly the 'carpet of snow'. Two sizes of white matte hex glitter, joined by a dash of holographic micro particles to create a sparkly glitter topper. 

Add a carpet of snow to your nail of the day, or perhaps some clouds?

At Petal Polish we use high quality, '3-free' (Toulene, Formaldehyde, and DBP free) lacquer base to create our polishes.

name: Iris
description:
3-free nail polish, hand mixed in Brisbane, Australia!

The Iris flower takes its name from the Greek word for 'rainbow', referring to the wide range of colours you can find it in. This polish is inspired by the 'Iris croatica', a beautiful flower my mother used to grow fields of. 

Primarily a dark purple, jelly base, this polish has specs of yellow matte hex glitter, and smaller specs of white matte hex glitter. For added sparkle, you'll find a sprinkle of micro holographic pieces dancing around the bottle. 

At Petal Polish we use high quality, '3-free' (Toulene, Formaldehyde, and DBP free) lacquer base to create our polishes.

name: Peony
description:
3-free nail polish, hand mixed in Brisbane, Australia!

Ah, the peony - my favourite flower. This unique polish is a mix of five different glitters: bubblegum pink, hot pink, and white matte hex, holographic silver hex, and a sprinkle of micro holographic specs to finish it off. 

Peony is a glitter topper, which looks gorgeous layered over a baby pink base.

At Petal Polish we use high quality, '3-free' (Toulene, Formaldehyde, and DBP free) lacquer base to create our polishes.

name: Poppy
description:
3-free nail polish, hand mixed in Brisbane, Australia!

Poppy is a red wine, jelly base with small matte black hex glitter. Reminiscent of its namesake - the red poppy. 

At Petal Polish we use high quality, '3-free' (Toulene, Formaldehyde, and DBP free) lacquer base to create our polishes.
